ygData.subject: RE: [shadowknight] Newbie here :) with questions..
ygData.msgSnippet: If your interested in roleplaying a DE then you can get lots of material about how DEs, or the Teir Dal, from the Library of the First Born
ygData.messageBody:
If your interested in roleplaying a DE then you can get lots of material
about how DEs, or the Teir'Dal, from the 'Library of the First Born'
(http://firstborn.eqhq.com/). There is a whole role playing section on
there that makes good reading.

Overall, act arrogant. Remember that as a Chosen of Innoruuk and one of the
'Firstborn' race you have the right to do as you wish. Add to this the
Honor of being a Knight of Innoruuk, blessed in His Eyes. I like to add a
little dedication to my god into this as well, where I will go out of the
way to seek the death of others, or die in the attempt in an overly arrogant
manner. Works great on PvP servers 8)

There is also lots to read on http://www.neriak.com

Nenadar W'Veryn
Shadow Knight of The Ebon Army
Tallon Zek


-----Original Message-----
From: keregan26@... [mailto:keregan26@...]
Sent: 14 November 2000 20:37
To: shadowknight@egroups.com
Subject: [shadowknight] Newbie here :) with questions..


I recently created a DE Sk..and have a question about role-playing
the character. Now she is looked on by most to be evil...yet..would
she not have a different view of herself?

Would she believe herself, her race, and God are not the evil ones?
How can that really be roll-played..and remember this is a total
newbie to role-playing here.

I have other characters..but seem to find my little Sk the hardest to
figure out :(

Any suggestions? Or any relevant info or guids on the web I can look
up?

Thanks! :)

Saelena - Dark Elf Shadow Knight

(Who also plays a character by the name Keregan....to explain my e-
mail address)

-= Support Evil Roleplaying =-
